title: Surface Book Review - The Almost Perfect 2 in 1
description:
My thoughts on the Microsoft Surface Book. Enjoy! A comprehensive review covering the screen, keyboard, trackpad, build quality, video editing performance and extensive gaming tests.
Purchase here - http://amzn.to/1Y9M31h

Is this the best laptop for students? Is it a good gaming laptop? Is it worth the money? Is it better than the 13" Macbook Pro?
Watch this video to find out! =)

Review unit: i5/8g/256g/Nvidia GPU

Be sure to check out some of my other hybrid laptop reviews:
HP Spectre - https://youtu.be/mH_swkTcsFw
Surface 3 - https://youtu.be/9yFrMgEerAs
Yoga 3 Pro - https://youtu.be/9F1k53y4Rf8
Asus T300 CHI - https://youtu.be/5H6d4MA-6X8


Desktop Wallpaper Download:
http://i.imgur.com/tM0XrNY.jpg by Justin Maller

Music Credits: 
Intro: Robotaki - Raton Laveur
Background: FILI - H2O

Follow me:
http://twitter.com/Dave2Dtv
